events.article_title: Gate.io to Delist Energo (TSL)

events.article_title: Gate.io to Delist Energo (TSL)
events.event_summary: Gate.io offers a buyback program for Energo (TSL) at a price of 0.000014305 USDT, with a maximum compensation limit of 100 USDT per user.
events.user_action_required: Users holding Energo (TSL) after December 15, 2024, can apply for the buyback by filling out a form between December 15 and December 22, 2024.
